author: skitching
msg: * Fix properly this time. The necessary surgery is a little deeper than first thought.
It makes no sense to close the output stream; the container will do it.
And it makes no sense to flush the response *after* writing out the resource contents
directly to the response output stream.
* Also fix binary incompatibility added in previous patch.

author: dreid
msg: Add the start of creating and writing CRL's to disk.
This is basically working, but needs the actual certificate details to
be added before it's really useful.

author: mreutegg
msg: JCR-1298: Wrong schemaObjectPrefix parameter in default repository.xml

author: nick
msg: Add a xlsx sample file with boolean formulas and values in it, as none of the official samples include any booleans!
